channel.title: Post your best bookmarklets
channel.description:
Just thought I'd share this Instant Ridge Forrester Bookmarklet with you people, I find it relaxing to just sometimes click it and enjoy the video.
Just bookmark this topic and change its URL to [code]javascript:(function(){document.body.innerHTML='<video controls autoplay src="https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/54200156/ridge_forrester.mp4" height="100%" width="100%"></video>'})();[/code]
Post yours
